answers.answer: Hello,to restore your health you need to manage your diabetes very well.This means lower carb diet, portion control as well, and very healthy foods (Protein, vegetables, limit fruits, and cut out junk food and sweets as much as possible).Exercise daily at least 30 minutes of moderate exercise.  more if you are able.Take medicine if necessary to keep your blood sugar normal.Drink plenty of clean water.Best wishes
